mapper.insert: replace into b_datatab ( module_name, quota_name, child_quota_name, avg_value, year, part_year, is_big_quota, beijing, tianjin, hebei, yibei, shanxi, shandong, shanghai, jiangsu, zhejiang, anhui, fujian, hubei, hunan, henan, jiangxi, sichuan, chongqing, liaoning, jilin, heilongjiang, mengdong, shanxi1, gansu, qinghai, ningxia, xinjiang, create_user_id, create_date, update_user_id, update_date ) values ( #{moduleName}, #{quotaName}, #{childQuotaName}, #{avgValue}, #{year}, #{partYear}, #{isBigQuota}, #{beijing}, #{tianjin}, #{hebei}, #{yibei}, #{shanxi}, #{shandong}, #{shanghai}, #{jiangsu}, #{zhejiang}, #{anhui}, #{fujian}, #{hubei}, #{hunan}, #{henan}, #{jiangxi}, #{sichuan}, #{chongqing}, #{liaoning}, #{jilin}, #{heilongjiang}, #{mengdong}, #{shanxi1}, #{gansu}, #{qinghai}, #{ningxia}, #{xinjiang}, #{createUserId}, #{createDate}, #{updateUserId}, #{updateDate} )
